introduction: Tayyab is an experienced Software Engineer and Researcher with a strong track record in the computer software industry. With over nine years of experience across diverse technology stacks and market domains, he has successfully designed, developed, and deployed a variety of software products. His core expertise lies in full-stack web development and data science, where he combines engineering excellence with analytical skills to deliver scalable and intelligent solutions.

details.title: Data Science and Machine Learning
details.content: Pursuing his career as a data scientist, he has developed a diverse portfolio of experience spanning both academia and industry. Since beginning his journey in the data and AI domain in 2019, he has contributed to a wide range of projects involving natural language processing (NLP), computer vision (CV), medical diagnosis, pattern recognition, chatbots, and recommender systems, applying both Machine Learning and Deep Learning methodologies. His technical expertise includes advanced proficiency in Python, TensorFlow 2 (Keras API), PyTorch, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Power BI, PostgreSQL, SQL Server (T-SQL), and MySQL. More recently, his work has focused on cutting-edge AI paradigms, including Large Language Models (LLMs), Diffusion Models, State Space Models, and Implicit Neural Representation Models. He also specializes in prompt engineering for complex reasoning, task automation, and efficient interaction with generative AI systems. He has authored several publications in leading peer-reviewed journals, demonstrating a strong academic foundation and a continued commitment to advancing research and innovation in artificial intelligence.

details.title: Full-Stack Development
details.content: As a full-stack developer, Tayyab has worked on numerous projects across diverse domains, including finance, banking, healthcare, and resource management. He has developed both single-page and multi-page web applications, integrated RESTful APIs, and utilized MVC-based frameworks. His experience further extends to building mobile and desktop applications, developing Windows services, and optimizing existing software solutions for performance, scalability, and maintainability. His technical expertise spans a wide range of technologies, including Python, Django REST Framework, FastAPI, PHP, WPF, Xamarin, Android, C#, ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Web API, ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework, AutoMapper, Dapper, Azure Functions, MS SQL Server, Neo4j, and MongoDB. On the frontend, he has worked extensively with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript, jQuery, Angular, React, Next.js, and Bootstrap, enabling him to deliver responsive, user-friendly, and high-performance web interfaces. Tayyab also has hands-on experience with deployment and cloud infrastructure, including setting up CI/CD pipelines, containerizing applications using Docker, and managing deployments on platforms such as DigitalOcean and AWS (S3, ECS, EC2). His DevOps skills ensure efficient development workflows, seamless integration, and reliable delivery of production-grade software systems.

details.title: Academic Research and Application Architecture
details.content: He has a strong passion for architecting end-to-end solutions that adhere to best coding and design practices, ensuring clean, efficient, and maintainable code. His approach focuses on scalability, reliability, and long-term manageability across all stages of software development. He also has extensive experience applying Test-Driven Development (TDD) principles to build robust and high-quality applications. In Artificial Intelligence, his work spans image super-resolution, diffusion models, and implicit neural representations, leveraging Deep Learning to solve complex computer vision problems. He has also applied machine learning techniques to data engineering tasks, including record deduplication, data integration, and intelligent data processing pipelines, demonstrating a strong ability to bridge AI with practical data solutions. His research and active interests are focused on Deep Learning applications in Computer Vision, Image Processing, and Natural Language Processing (NLP). In addition, he brings significant expertise in the healthcare domain, having developed and integrated end-to-end assistive solutions for Electronic Health Record (EHR) systems, with familiarity in standards such as HL7, FHIR, CDA, and C-CDA, ensuring compliance and interoperability across medical software ecosystems.
